summary: Most requested functionality appears implemented: backend now has persisted SiteSettings with get/update methods; frontend has a new Admin Site Settings page, routing and sidebar nav item, React Query hooks, and shopper Header now reflects saved branding with fallback. One key requirement cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary: backend admin credential support for username "admin" and password "Admin@123" (REQ-53).

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the admin login flow succeeds with username "admin" and password "Admin@123" using backend adminAuthenticate(username, password), returning a token and enabling subsequent verifyAdminToken checks.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows frontend calling adminAuthenticate and storing the token, and AdminLayoutPage verifying a token, but does not show any backend change confirming that adminAuthenticate accepts the required credentials or that verifyAdminToken logic matches the frontend token storage. backend/main.mo is truncated before any admin authentication implementation, and the modified useAuthz.ts is only referenced in a file summary without code evidence.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuthz.ts but no code shown)

hallucinated_features.description: Added client-side logo file size validation (max 2MB) in the Admin Site Settings page.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-55 requires a logo file input, preview, and save; it does not request a specific file size limit.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a default shop name "Canfinity Store" during migration/initial state.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-52 requires persisted settings but does not specify default initial values.
